Replying to @elijahmanor 2020-09-09 14:55
@elijahmanor @dceddia If these URLs are trying to hit Netlify functions, perhaps try specifying the URLs for those that Netlify will generate. Netlify doesn't assume you want your serverless functions exposed in /api/* For example (and without seeing your code) /rss /.netlify/functions/rss.js 200!
